title: Installation "Focus"
intro_text: The abstract sculpture "concentration" by Seiji Kimoto was created in 1999 without thematic specification or context. It was recommended for acquisition to Saarland casinos GmbH by Josef Gros and set up initially at the locations of Spielbank Saarbrücken. In 2012, it was relocated to a small art collection in the rooms of the lottery house Saarbrücken for safety reasons.
